import api from'./api';// store our JWT in LS and set axios headers if we do have a token
const setAuthToken=token=>{if(token){api.defaults.headers.common['x-auth-token']=token;localStorage.setItem('token',token);}else{delete api.defaults.headers.common['x-auth-token'];localStorage.removeItem('token');}};export default setAuthToken;
